author: sichen
msg: Fixed bugs with billing account where the updatePaymentApplicationDef method was implemented incorrectly to the design of the PaymentApplication/BillingAccount data model.  Now you can use payment and applications to add value to and apply value from a billing account, though this really needs some serious refactoring or rewriting
